body: I think it would be better if we didn't have a `reset()` method on `Sampler`s. Creating a new one is generally the same as reseting an existing one, but is so much clearer.
body_html: I think it would be better if we didn't have a reset() method on Samplers. Creating a new one is generally the same as reseting an existing one, but is so much clearer.
body_text: I think it would be better if we didn't have a reset() method on Samplers. Creating a new one is generally the same as reseting an existing one, but is so much clearer.
